comments.body: Quote from: eBuyerx on May 30, 2023, 06:25:05 PMNeed btc have neteller. euroEscrow?Does Neteller have charge-back?For a newbie, having charge-back option is risky.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Yes Neteller does have charge-back, we all should be very carreful with this method of paymentOP, you should at least mention :-the amount of euros you want to exchange-if you accept escrow or not (if not, you are wasting your time here)
